messages.title: Standing Up for Britain
messages.content: Sarah Newton and Theresa May standing up for Britain

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will increase the schools budget by £4bn by 2022. More than a real terms increase per pupil. Every child in Falmouth will get a quality education.
Working with Ron Daniels of the UK Sepsis Trust. Set up the Parliamentary Group for Sepsis. Supported by the Sepsis Trust, the NHS and my constituent Melissa Mead.

issues.education: We will increase the schools budget by £4bn by 2022. More than a real terms increase per pupil. Every child in Falmouth will get a quality education.
issues.health: Working with Ron Daniels of the UK Sepsis Trust.

community.content: About four years ago I started doing volunteer work at the Pondhead at Highworth. Sarah supported the project and brought people into the community.

endorsements.endorsement: When I first moved here to attend university, Sarah helped me overcome the difficulties I experienced with accommodation. I have now settled here, and happily recommend Sarah to continue as our MP.

About four years ago I started doing volunteer work at the Pondhead at Highworth. Sarah supported the project and brought people into the community. I always find it hard to believe how many things she does - she's always been a very active MP in Cornwall.

images.caption: Sarah Setting the Record Straight on School Funding
